text: RCP (MediationZone internal protocol) communication can be secured using TLS (Transport Layer Security). To enable SSL for RCP communication, please refer to the Enable One-way SSL On RCP . For improved security with Two-way SSL (mutual authentication), please refer to the Enable Two-way SSL On RCP . This chapter includes the following sections: Enable One-way SSL On RCP Enable Two-way SSL On RCP RCP TLS Properties
title: RCP Encryption - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
